text:
Here’s what I found on accessibility pass:
- Trends & Earth: Learn more link on home screen is not focusable, therefore cannot be clicked and about modal cannot be accessed. Either needs to be a clickable row item like other settings items or maybe link can be specifically focusable.
- Earth: Content description "Photos X of Y" in gallery & "Photo X of Y" on image preview.
- Trends: on country setting listview, there could be an indication of what is currently selected?
there is one
should be a blue bar on the left side of the list item row that is currently selected
audio indication is what I meant
oh
yeah go for it
but this already exists on the home screen, so probably unnecessary at this point, hence the question mark
look for the setSelected(true) code in there
and the other two seem more pressing
1) should be doable in xml (?)
2) Yes.
1) made a link programmatically not xml
ah!
is it populating a text view?
yes
in wallpaper row, so that it doesn’t effect the os setting
gotcha
the textview is in the layout tho, right
yes
pls visit me in exlo
